meanings.definition: The measurement or extent of something from end to end.
meanings.sent1: She carefully measured the lengths of the fabric before cutting.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter needed to know the lengths of the boards for the project.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the yarn, unraveling different lengths in a playful manner.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work knew no bounds, going to great lengths to ensure perfection.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner pushed herself to the lengths of her endurance to reach the finish line.

meanings.definition: The amount of time taken to complete something.
meanings.sent1: The lengths of the movie surprised her as it seemed to go on forever.
meanings.sent2: He finished the puzzle in record time, completing it in just a few lengths.
meanings.sent3: The lengths it took for the pizza delivery to arrive tested their patience.
meanings.sent4: The lengths of the meeting dragged on, making everyone eager to leave.
meanings.sent5: The lengths of the school day felt never-ending to the tired students.

meanings.definition: The extent or distance between two points.
meanings.sent1: The lengths between the two cities made for a long road trip.
meanings.sent2: She estimated the lengths between the trees to set up the hammock.
meanings.sent3: The lengths between the siblings in age led to interesting dynamics in the family.
meanings.sent4: The emotional lengths between them seemed insurmountable at times.
meanings.sent5: The lengths of the river stretched out before them, a beautiful sight to behold.
